# aquasec_aqua_label (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Aqua label name.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Aqua label description.

### Read-Only

- `author` (String) The name of the user who created the Aqua label.
